doc:
Clarence Muse https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Clarence_Muse 0 Clarence Muse (October 14, 1889 – October 13, 1979) was an actor, screenwriter, director, composer, and lawyer. He was inducted in the Black Filmmakers Hall of Fame in 1973. Muse was the first African American to "star" in a film. He acted for fifty years, and appeared in more than 150 movies. Clarence_Muse ( October_14_,_1889 – October_13_,_1979 ) was an_actor , screenwriter , director , composer , and lawyer . He was_inducted in the_Black_Filmmakers_Hall of Fame in 1973 . Muse was the_first_African_American_to_"_star " in a_film . He acted for fifty_years , and appeared in more_than_150_movies .
